checks.name: no-console-log
checks.description: Detect console.log statements in source code
checks.message: Remove console.log before committing. Use a structured logger instead.

checks.name: no-hardcoded-secrets
checks.description: Detect hardcoded API keys, secrets, and credentials
checks.message: Possible hardcoded secret detected. Use environment variables instead.

checks.name: no-ts-ignore
checks.description: Detect @ts-ignore comments that hide type errors
checks.message: Do not use @ts-ignore or @ts-nocheck. Fix the type error instead.

checks.name: no-any-type
checks.message: Avoid 'any' type. Use 'unknown' with type narrowing, or define a proper type.
